name: Doomga's Corridor Remastered
description:
Doomga's Corridor is back! This time Doomga is not here anymore and you have to deal with his ghosts! Your objective is to find out what hides in the room at the end of the corridor!

Good luck!

Controls: 

WASD - Movement 

Left Click - Interact

Right Click - Use Key

4 - Lighter

7 - Cameroid

Shift - Sprint

Ctrl - Crouch

Space - Jump

Tab - Inventory

Esc - Options

(This game contains jumpscares)

(Game made in 4 days)
